name: heroku-nexmo-teneo
description: A Nexmo IVR solution powered by Teneo.

NEXMO_API_KEY.description: Please input your Nexmo API Key

NEXMO_API_SECRET.description: Please input your Nexmo API Secret

TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: The client_email property from your google_creds.json file.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private_key property from your google_creds.json file. Make sure to copy and paste everything here.

TTS_LANG_CODE.description: Language setting for Google Text-to-speech API. Egs en-US, en-GB or ja-JP

TTS_GENDER.description: Gender setting for Google Text-to-speech API. Can be MALE, FEMALE or NEUTRAL

STT_LANG_CODE.description: Language setting for Google Speech-to-text API response. Egs en-US, en-GB or ja-JP

NEXMO_VOICE.description: Voice name for Speech-to-text response from Nexmo. Egs Brian, Gwyneth etc.

TTS_RESPONSE_PROVIDER.description: Choose between google or nexmo (no quotation marks required)
